remarks: An upper bound to the distance of two elements in a closed interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
iccsuble.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
iccsuble.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
iccsuble.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
iccsuble.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
iccsuble $p |- ( ph -> ( C - D ) <_ ( B - A ) ) $.
